title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Condition\QueryTerm
name: QueryTerm
description:
Query terms that we want to match on.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.Condition.QueryTerm

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.value
params.description: The value of the term to match on. Value cannot be empty. Value can have at most 3 terms if specified as a partial match. Each space separated string is considered as one term. Example) "a b c" is 3 terms and allowed, " a b c d" is 4 terms and not allowed for partial match.

params.name: data.full_match
params.description: Whether this is supposed to be a full or partial match.
